text: Fortuna Sittard is a Dutch association football team from Sittard, Netherlands. On 1 July 1968, Fortuna 54 and Sittardia came together to form Fortuna Sittard. Fortuna 54 was a successful team that won the KNVB Cup. On the other hand, Sittardia was trying to avoid relegation for most of its history. The Royal Dutch Football Association said it would take away Fortuna Sittard's license to play in the 2010â€“11 season. After going to court, the decision was taken away. ==Honours== * KNVB Cup ** Winner: 1957, 1964 ** Runners-up: 1984, 1999 * Eerste Divisie ** Winner: 1959, 1964, 1966, 1995 * Promoted to Eredivisie **
